boat.name: Gretel
boat.full_description:
Gretel has a cabin with bunk cushions, a porta -pottie and a spirit  stove.  She has a battery with a solar panel and nav ,lights,depth  sounder and log.

The fittings have all been replaced  with stainless and she has  Anderson winches.  The epoxied plate is a replacement, and  she has lead ballast, and new plate bolt and  winch. Apart from the standard sails she has a storm jib and a  spinnaker..She has a 3/4 cover and little used mercury 3.5 outboard.  She is for sale for £7,000 and has a trolley by Tyrone Snell with winch and towhitch for an extra £500.  Contact David Gorrod on 07768 293943
boat.short_description: Gretel.is a cabin version of the popular Memory19
